#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    int freq[1001] = {0};
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int num;
        scanf("%d", &num);
        freq[num]++;
    }
    int max_freq = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1000; i++) {
        if (freq[i] > max_freq) {
            max_freq = freq[i];
        }
    }
    char first_output[5];
    if (n % 2 == 0) {
        if (max_freq <= n/2) {
            strcpy(first_output, "YES");
        } else {
            strcpy(first_output, "NO");
        }
    } else {
        if (max_freq <= (n/2)+1) {
            strcpy(first_output, "YES");
        } else {
            strcpy(first_output, "NO");
        }
    }

    // Second step: replace commas with spaces
    char second_output[5];
    strcpy(second_output, first_output);
    for (int i = 0; second_output[i] != '\0'; i++) {
        if (second_output[i] == ',') {
            second_output[i] = ' ';
        }
    }

    // Third step: process the string
    char *input_str = second_output;
    int len = strlen(input_str);
    char a[len+1];
    char b[len+1];
    strcpy(a, input_str);
    strcpy(b, input_str);

    // Process a (forward)
    int a1 = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i < len; i++) {
        if (a[i] == a[i-1]) {
            a[i] = (a[i] == '0') ? '1' : '0';
            a1++;
        }
    }

    // Process b (backward)
    int a2 = 0;
    for (int i = len-1; i > 0; i--) {
        if (b[i] == b[i-1]) {
            b[i-1] = (b[i-1] == '0') ? '1' : '0';
            a2++;
        }
    }

    int result = (a1 < a2) ? a1 : a2;
    printf("%d\n", result);

    return 0;
}
